news_header: Pope Francis is hospitalized due to a complex clinical situation involving a polymicrobial infection of his respiratory tract, requiring a change in treatment. The 88-year-old pontiff had bronchitis symptoms prior to his admission and is currently in good spirits, though he has been advised to rest completely.
news_original_title: Pope's health a 'complex clinical situation', Vatican says
news_text: He has missed public events, including his weekly prayer and a special mass, and has a history of health issues.
